rows.label: qev097703_MSG0001
rows.name: I've received the data you were able to salvage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097703_MSG0002
rows.name:
Seems it wasn't just library data—it looks like an
automatic communication log of some sort.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097703_MSG0003
rows.name:
The time stamp places it just before the White Whale
crashed, and the sender is a different ark ship sent up
from another country.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097703_MSG0004
rows.name:
Needless to say, the Whale's crew had their hands full
at the time, so they were too busy to trace the other
ship's course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097703_MSG0005
rows.name: Or even to analyze the message's contents, frankly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097703_MSG0006
rows.name:
But doing that now may bring to light all kinds of
important new info.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097703_MSG0007
rows.name:
Which means finding this data was a big deal.
Great work, tiger![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097703_MSG0008
rows.name:
...Unless it turns out the data is actually useless,
in which case this was a waste of everyone's time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097703_MSG0009
rows.name:
BUT! None of that changes the fact that your job is to
grab the core memory module and bring it home safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097703_MSG0010
rows.name: Don't leave a single byte behind, honey![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097703_MSG0011
rows.name: Nice work out there![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097703_MSG0012
rows.name: I'll take that memory module off your hands...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097703_MSG0013
rows.name: Perfect. Thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097703_MSG0014
rows.name:
Oh, and Commander Vandham was reeeally interested
in that data sample you sent on ahead...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097703_MSG0015
rows.name:
He's been super impatient for you to get back with the
rest of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097703_MSG0016
rows.name:
Seems he's ready to call this a historic find even before
the analysis comes back on the contents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097703_MSG0017
rows.name:
You unearthed a real treasure this time.
Well, according to him, anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097703_MSG0018
rows.name:
Oh, but don't bother asking for a bonus.
Won't happen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097703_MSG0019
rows.name: BLADE contracts are extremely strict, you know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097703_MSG0020
rows.name:
But it's for the good of the city, I suppose—
and for us BLADEs by extension.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097703_MSG0021
rows.name:
Makes it harder to complain when you think of it like
that, hmm? Still possible, mind...but harder.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097703_MSG0022
rows.name:
Still, no sense wasting time and social capital whining
about the little things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097703_MSG0023
rows.name:
Not when there's big jobs with fat rewards waiting to
get done![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev097703_MSG0024
rows.name:
There's something about risking it all for that high-
stakes payoff that just gets the blood pumping,
you know? Adventure makes me hot and bothered![ST:wait ]
